Package org.apache.lenya.cms.observation

Interface Summary
ObservationRegistry Observation registry.
RepositoryListener Listener to repository events.
 

Class Summary
AbstractRepositoryListener Abstract repository listener implementation which registeres with the observation registry at startup.
DocumentEvent Document-related event.
RepositoryEvent A repository event provides additional information if a document was added, changed, or removed.
RepositoryEventFactory Factory to create repository events.
 

Exception Summary
ObservationException Observation-specific exception.
